market_summary: News flow is heavily concentrated in mega-cap equities ("Magnificent 7" framing) across multiple tickers in the current portfolio universe (source: https://api.financialdatasets.ai/news/?ticker=MSFT&limit=10&start_date=2026-02-09&end_date=2026-02-12 ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/news/?ticker=NVDA&limit=10&start_date=2026-02-09&end_date=2026-02-12).

Cloud-growth narrative remains a key near-term theme in coverage: "Amazon, Microsoft, and Alphabet All Reported Robust Cloud Growth. 1 Was a Clear Winner" (source: https://api.financialdatasets.ai/news/?ticker=AMZN&limit=10&start_date=2026-02-09&end_date=2026-02-12).

Defensive/quality positioning continues to show up in media coverage via dividend/consumer-staples angles (e.g., dividend-focused pieces mentioning XOM/WMT/LMT) (sources: https://api.financialdatasets.ai/news/?ticker=XOM&limit=10&start_date=2026-02-09&end_date=2026-02-12 ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/news/?ticker=WMT&limit=10&start_date=2026-02-09&end_date=2026-02-12).

thesis: Constraint-first: current 12-name mix is sector-balanced with no sector >25% and max position <=12%, so no forced action is indicated today (sources for sectors: https://api.financialdatasets.ai/company/facts?ticker=MSFT ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/company/facts?ticker=NVDA ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/company/facts?ticker=AAPL ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/company/facts?ticker=GOOGL ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/company/facts?ticker=AMZN ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/company/facts?ticker=JPM ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/company/facts?ticker=V ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/company/facts?ticker=MA ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/company/facts?ticker=XOM ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/company/facts?ticker=LMT ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/company/facts?ticker=LLY ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/company/facts?ticker=WMT).

30-day horizon: recent news items retrieved are largely broad market commentary or evergreen analysis rather than clearly thesis-breaking, company-specific negatives for these holdings (sources: the per-ticker news endpoints listed above).
Determinism: with no uniquely high-severity, verified thesis-damage headline in the retrieved 72-hour news set for any current holding, "Do nothing" dominates discretionary swaps.
risks: Opportunity cost: if a specific factor regime shift accelerates (e.g., rotation away from mega-cap growth), holding steady may underperform in the next ~30 days (source context: broad market commentary in news feeds such as https://api.financialdatasets.ai/news/?ticker=GOOGL&limit=10&start_date=2026-02-09&end_date=2026-02-12).

Concentration-by-theme risk: multiple holdings are exposed to AI/cloud capex narratives, which can become crowded (sources: https://api.financialdatasets.ai/news/?ticker=MSFT&limit=10&start_date=2026-02-09&end_date=2026-02-12 ; https://api.financialdatasets.ai/news/?ticker=AMZN&limit=10&start_date=2026-02-09&end_date=2026-02-12).
Sector reclassification/data issues could change constraint math if sector tags differ from the company facts data used here (source of truth used: company facts URLs listed above).
falsifiable_checks: If any holding prints a clearly company-specific adverse update (e.g., regulatory action, guidance cut) in the next 30 days that is captured in the same news feed, reassess and consider a Replace/Trim.
If sector totals drift above 25% due to re-weighting or changes in classification, rebalance to restore compliance (sectors from company facts endpoints cited above).
trade_of_the_day.why_now: Next 6â€“18 months: maintain a diversified quality+momentum basket across multiple sectors while avoiding unnecessary turnover; current verified news does not present a single, high-conviction catalyst that would justify a deterministic swap today (sources: per-ticker news endpoints for 2026-02-09 to 2026-02-12, e.g., https://api.financialdatasets.ai/news/?ticker=MSFT&limit=10&start_date=2026-02-09&end_date=2026-02-12).

constraints_check.notes: Weights were deterministically rebalanced to satisfy position and sector constraints.
